question: Who is the author of the book ‘Sridevi: Girl Woman Superstar?
explanation: The book titled ‘Sridevi: Girl Woman Superstar’ has been written by author-screenwriter Satyarth Nayak & will be launched on Sridevi’s 56th birth anniversary. It recounts the life and times of the iconic actor who changed how women stars were perceived in the male-dominated film industry. It will not only chronicle  Sridevi’s journey and successes in the Indian film industry but also her innings after her big screen comeback in 2012 with \"English Vinglish\". As per author, the book will explore deep into Sridevi\'s iconic body of work in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam and Kannada cinema.  The book will be published under the Ebury Press imprint of Penguin Random House in October 2019 and is available for pre-order on e-commerce websites.
